name: Drew Tucker
text: Finally tried Upper Crust for the first time recently. Unfortunately was not very impressed. The crust tasted like card board.  I have had better pizza from a gas station. Since moving to Jonesboro we have tried all of the pizza places in town and by far The Lost Pizza Company is the best..

name: Skylar Adams
text: Their Pizza taste great to me.

name: Tanner Butler
text: Pizza was good salad was not lettuce was wilted

name: GCOMmom
text: Upper Crust has the best pizza in Jonesboro, hands down.

name: Marc Barrett
text: Worked here for a long time. Came in for lunch with some old friends and our food was great. There are some good people still left at the store, but it is nowhere near what it used to be in terms of quality of service. Hard to keep up standards when you have insane turnover rates.

name: LJ Silas
text: Went to Upper Crust for the first time today. Walked in and the place was not all that busy. My wife and I stood at the hostess podium for at least 3-5 minutes before some lady from behind the counter finally decides to acknowledge that ‚Ä¶More

name: Google User
text: Great pizza. Often very loud. But, excellent customer service. Check out deals around town app for a discount off your pizza

name: Beverly Snow
text: Great food and service. Also loved the choice of classic rock music they had on while I was there.

name: Shirley Berry
text: The Food is good. I like their small 4 pc. Pizza and subs. They play great music!!

name: Richard Louis
text: Food was exceptional, but service was awful! Waitresses didn't even wait on us until having been seated for 20 minutes - not even a word. Didn't seem to really care about providing quality service. This is supposed to be a premier pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: tracy Covington
text: the service and food was amazing...thank you guys for ALL your hard work... EXCELLENT JOBüòäwill make this my new pizza placeüçï

name: C Dub
text: They are open 11-9 Sundays.

name: Allison Allen
text: Relaxed atmosphere, delicious pizza!

name: Chad White
text: The Upper Crust Pizza Co. has some great pizza.  I would call it a "brick oven" style with a very crisp crust.  I suggest you begin your visit with the chips and dip.  Might not be what you're expecting.  It's a "Ruffles" style chip with homemade ranch dip.  Very good.

name: James Lennartz
text: Not too bad!  I had the Calzone and it had really good flavor and the crust was crisp and not greasy.  A huge plus.  Only downfall was the lighting, the booth that I sat in had no light and all others around did.

name: Joyce Burks
text: Good pizza like the away it  taste

name: Sean Meece
text: Some of the best pizza and calzones I've had. The Ranchero calzone is my favorite menu item. The smooth and creamy house dipping sauce pairs perfectly with the bite of the jalapenos and pepper Jack cheese. Also recommend the mini apple calzone for dessert üëåüëç

name: Leelonna Payne
text: Our food was great, but the delivery person was rude when asking for a phone number to be placed on the order next time even though clear directions were given to apartment. Just lost our personal and business orders. The manager, Reece, ‚Ä¶More

name: Rose Sneed
text: The barbecue chicken pizza is awesome. I get it every time I go there. The spicy sticks are really good too. The highland location does not serve alcohol. The Parker road location does and has more of a bar atmosphere. But the pizza is great at both locations.

name: frank kasper
text: Great place for a quick lunch. Pizza, salads and hot sandwiches!

name: Sonja Ross
text: Wonderful food

name: Tim Adams
text: The pizzas are wonderful

name: bryan privett
text: Great pizza good atmosphere.

name: Johnny Tierce
text: Best pizza in town in you like thin crust.  House dressing on their salad is pretty great.

name: Karen Slicer
text: Great service. Great pizza!

name: Kristie S
text: Best salads and pizza! Half turkey salad is great and a mini pizza is the perfect size for one

name: Larry Huey
text: There are good pizza places around, but, Upper Crust has the best taste, a delicious (Upper) crust and several unique and delicious combinations to choose from. It is my "go-to" place when I want pizza!

name: Jacob Baldwin
text: Upper Crust is a good chain out here. There can be a longer wait than you'd like, but it's good food.

name: Chardaesha Boatwright
text: Service was great. Good tastes good. Prices are reasonable. I'll definitely be going back.

name: Tanya Isom
text: Uppercrust pizza on highland has great food, friendly service, and is a great spot for a good quick lunch.  There mini pizza with a free salad or chip and dip is the perfect meal.

name: Kris Williams
text: If you like a nice crispy thin crust and a variety of specialty pies, this is your place.

name: Whitney Kalista
text: Use to order delivery and was great since March orders are missing items paid for or just not done correctly. Yet, it only seems to happen when the tip is less than 10 dollars. Their online site asks you to add your tip when you pay online; ‚Ä¶More

name: Jarrod Patton
text: One of the best pizzas in Jonesboro with a relaxed atmosphere and plenty of options. The salads are pretty great too, coming from a guy who doesn't really eat salad.

name: Rita Spencer
text: Had lunch with my neighbor awesome pizza.

name: Michael Ames
text: Some of the best Pizza in Jonesboro Arkansas if you like thin crust. Pizza is not the only thing on the menu and every thing is good.

name: RoseAnn Puckett
text: Great pizza. Got the Widowmaker for a meat pizza delish not greasy.

name: Carl deshazer
text: Great food

name: Jamie Gould
text: Good food and service

name: Abby Johnson
text: Slowest delivery I've ever seen. The pizza is good but we waited an hour and a half for one medium pepperoni pizza because of a "back up on deliveries".

name: Butternutz Ahoy
text: Thanks for helping me out of my square pizza rut. Great pies!

name: Mallory Mouzy
text: The whole staff is amazing. Best pizza in JB and best ranch in the world!!

name: karen white
text: Staff was rude. Pizza was not good. One had no sauce and the other had too much sauce.

name: Jesse Cox
text: Love the pizza and they deliver near nestle and the others  will not deliver where i live.

name: Georgetta Jones
text: The pizza was delicious

name: Martin Korf
text: Awsome costumer service and fast delivery. thank you otr trucker

name: Christy Coles mum
text: Try the chicken mushroom pizza!

text: Usually a 5 but waiter brought no serving plates didn't ask if we needed refills on our drinks.

text: This pizza ugly at upper crust pizza co

name: Brian Scott Casey
text: Absolute horrible service.  Staff standing around not at all attentive to the customers.

name: Patricia Stallings
text: Great!

text: Tried to call to place an order, they hang up on you and then don't answer again. Won't be back.

text: Great crust

name: rachael Owens
text: Tasty

text: Love it.
